contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Settlement | name = Gokseong | native_name = 곡성 | native_name_lang = ko | settlement_type = [[List of cities in South Korea|County]] | translit_lang1 = Korean | translit_lang1_type1 = Hangul | translit_lang1_info1 = {{linktext|곡|성|군}} | translit_lang1_type2 = Hanja | translit_lang1_info2 = {{linktext|谷|城|郡}} | translit_lang1_type3 = {{nowrap|Revised Romanization}} | translit_lang1_info3 = Gokseong-gun | translit_lang1_type4 = {{nowrap|McCune-Reischauer}} | translit_lang1_info4 = Koksŏng-gun | image_skyline = | imagesize = | image_caption = | image_map = South Jeolla-Gokseong.svg | mapsize = | map_caption = Location in South Korea | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = {{flag|South Korea}} | subdivision_type1 = [[Regions of Korea|Region]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Honam]] | population_blank1_title = Dialect | population_blank1 = [[Jeolla dialect|Jeolla]] | area_total_km2 = 547.37 | population_as_of = 2001 | population_total = 37080 | population_density_km2 = 67.7 | parts_type = [[Administrative divisions of South Korea|Administrative divisions]] | parts = 1 ''eup'', 10 ''myeon'' | image_blank_emblem = Gokseong logo.png | blank_emblem_type = Emblem of Gokseong }} '''Gokseong County''' (''Gokseong-gun'') is a [[Administrative divisions of South Korea|county]] in [[South Jeolla]] Province, [[South Korea]]. ==Attractions== * Taeansa Temple<ref>Cin Woo Lee [http://www.cnngo.com/seoul/visit/33-beautiful-temples-enlightenment-857401 "Simply stunning: 33 incredible Korean temples"] ''CNN Go''. 10 February 2012. Retrieved 2012-04-12</ref> * Neungpa Tower * Dongli mountain valley * Gok-song Haneulnari Village (a farming-themed village) ==Transportation== ===Train=== [[Jeolla Line]] comes into Gokseong station. The [[Saemaul-ho|Saemaul]] and [[Mugunghwa-ho|Mugunghwa]] trains all stop on the way to Gokseong. ===Bus=== Buses to Gwangju and Gurye take 30 minutes and to Namone takes one hour. However, it is quite difficult to go to southern parts of Jeollas like [[Suncheon, Jeonnam]]. ===Car=== There are 3 interchanges on the [[Honam Expressway]]. These interactions are joined with other roads. ==Sister cities== Gokseong is [[town twinning|twinned]] with: * {{flagicon|South Korea}} [[Gangdong-gu]], [[South Korea]] (1996) * {{flagicon|South Korea}} [[Geochang]], [[South Korea]] (1998) * {{flagicon|South Korea}} [[Seo-gu, Busan|Seo-gu]], [[South Korea]] (2000) * {{flagicon|South Korea}} [[Uijeongbu]], [[South Korea]] (2010) ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.gokseong.go.kr/site/english/index_eng.htm County government home page] {{South Jeolla}} {{coord|35.2808333433|N|127.295277788|E|source:ruwiki_region:KR_type:city(37080)|format=dms|display=title}} [[Category:Counties of South Jeolla Province]] [[Category:Gokseong| ]] {{SouthKorea-geo-stub}}
